item.title: Get the SSPList Id and termSetItem Id
item.description: To get the sspListId the following url will display it https://<tenant>.sharepoint.com/sites/<site>/_api/web/lists/getbytitle('<list>')/fields?$filter=InternalName eq '<internalMetadataColumnName>' To get the termSetList Id go to the TermStore Admin Centre There are 2 option to get there Go to Site Settings and under Site Administration select Term store management https://<tenant>.sharepoint.com/sites/<site>/_layouts/15/SiteAdmin.aspx#/termStoreAdminCenter Selec the termset you are using and under unique identifier there is the termSetList Id

item.title: Update Environment Variables
item.description: We all know the scenario, a managed solution has been imported but one of the variables has been set incorrectly. How do I go and update this to the correct value? Within Dataverse there are 2 tables called ‘Environment Variable Value’ and ‘Environment Variable Definition’ these store the value of each variable and the definition of the variable respectively. The following guides will explain how to build a canvas app and/or a Flow to update the values only.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome my spot on the Intranet I will be writting various pieces on a range of subjects many of which are mentioned below. I’m a senior consultant at a Microsoft partner currently focusing on many aspects of the Power Platform, Power Apps, Power Automate and Power BI as well as working on SharePoint intranets and document management systems. I like my home automation so will have a few posts on my automation projects and making my home “smart”.
